title: We need to talk about the US election | with Noam Chomsky
description:
JuiceMedia Podcast Ep. 15: In which I ask world-renowned intellectual, activist and political dissident Noam Chomsky about the unfolding trainwreck of the 2020 US election, the state of humanity, the breakdown of democracy, the rise of conspiracy theories, the prosecution of Julian Assange, the role of satire - and what helps to keep him going amidst all this shitfuckery.
